solution.text:
we can clearly see that the smaller triangle with base as Robot and bigger triangle with base as candle are similar
if the speed is v and time taken is _{k}_ sec, distance (d) of robot from the candle =v\(\times \)_{k}_
as triangles are similar we can write, \(\frac L{_{k}_v+L}=\frac hH\)
Putting L=_{{3*k}}_ , h=_{j}_, H= _{{2*j}}_, we get
\(\frac {_{{3*k}}_}{_{k}_v+_{{3*k}}_}=\frac {_{j}_}{_{{2*j}}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow 2\times _{{3*k}}_=_{k}_v + _{{3*k}}_\)
hence,v=3 cm/s
